properties.address: Cornerstone @ St Peters Church, Church Street, Burnham, Burnham, Buckinghamshire SL1 7HX
properties.description: Every Wednesday, Cornerstone at St Peter's Church, Burnham is a social, warm and comforting place which is open to all. We offer hot beverages and light refreshments - including toasted goodies. An assortment of biscuits, cakes and other treats are often available. Friendly conversation, quiet chats, lively laughter, and community spirit are frequently found too. It's a busy, happy and active place to be. You can visit the church or churchyard for some peace, nature, history and heritage; feel free to bring a favourite book to read, some knitting to do or just sit and relax. You are welcome to do it all! Wednesday Welcome is our midweek opportunity to catch up with friends and make new ones too, as we welcome many visitors to Cornerstone, from the community, and even further afield. Accessible area, on the ground floor, with tables, chairs and open spaces. So, if you're in the Burnham area on Wednesdays between 10am - Noon, we'd love to make you welcome and hope you'll become one of our Wednesday Welcome regulars. Please note: We are CLOSED for the month of August, we will be back on 3rd September 2025.
properties.title: St Peter's Church Cornerstone - Wednesday Welcome
